presets.content: We sɛmɛ w’a ja ta All Children Reading: A Grand Challenge for Development (ACR GCD) tɔ wu zin-kapyeɲɛɛnɛɛ pu zuli fanha ni (United States Agency for International Development [USAID], World Vision ni Australian Government) ni Global Book Alliance wu baaripyeɲɛɛgɛ koro fɛni. W’a yaa SIL LEAD, Inc. wu mu, wa li wajibi di ɲɛ, wu di saha ni zin-kapyeɲɛɛnɛɛ ACR GCD kelee Global Book Alliance wu wo ɲagaŋaa ki ni wɛ. We sɛmɛ we yaadee wu kelee wu gbɔnɲɛri wa bɛɛri ɲɛ yaa na weeni ACR GCD wo sariya-koro-gbɔnɲɛri wɛ, wa ACR GCD naha ja yere we gbɔnɲɛri we funŋɔ keree kelee wu tapiinye yi ɲuŋɔtaan wɛ.
